name: Lightning Tether
desc:
You tether yourself to a target creature with a stream of electricity six inches wide. The tether has a maximum length of 60 feet, and moving farther than 60 feet from your target ends the spell.

When you move, the tether moves with you. Any creature that touches the tether or starts their turn inside the tether's area takes 1d8 lightning damage. A creature can only take this damage once between each of your turns.
empower: Tether maximum range increased to 120 feet.
author: CrusaderDroid
